column1: # id is a string to identify the project

column2: separated list of settings that must be true for this project to be enabled.

column1: # project_type is the type of the project. Currently supported ones are 'terraforming' and 'industry'
# tooltip is how this project is displayed on the buttons on the UI. Sorry it's a terrible name

column2: separated list of requirement IDs as specified in 'terraforming_requirements.csv'. These are checked in an AND manner, ie all of the requirements have to be true for this check to return true. Each option has an optional tooltip override specified after a ;, ie 'requirement ; tooltip_override'. If a tooltip override is not specified, the requirements tooltip will be used

column1: # requirements_hidden is the same as requirements, but they must be met for the project to be visible. Both this and requirements must be met for the project to be started
# base_project_duration is the base number of days the project takes to complete

column2: separated list of duration modifier IDs that are specified in 'duration_modifiers.csv'
separated list of project effect IDs that are specified in 'project_effects.csv'

column1: # requirements_{incomplete,complete,disrupted} is a list of requirement IDs same as requirements. They're for determining whether the project is incomplete, complete, or disrupted, as well as the tooltip to show for each requirement
